title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in table filter.
description: When providing the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter value in a table, an error occurs.
OB:
When saving and previewing the report, the filter does not work. Instead, an error message is displayed on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8.
Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))
Detail: An error occurred during data type conversion. The value cannot be converted to a date.
EB: The filter should work without errors when using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in the table filter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a datasource and a dataset that contains a datetime column.
2. Insert a table in the report.
3. Create a filter based on the datetime column.
4. In the value1 field of the filter, input the value new Date("..."). For example, new Date("3/2/2005").
